__e: Viola ... which to confirm, I'll bring you to a captain by whose gentle help I was preserved... to serve this noble count.
Just a minute... and your soul will be saved forever.
But even though I remember it all clearly, what saved me was that I felt no hatred.
Hey, Arthur, the woman who went out the window?
That stone has saved eeta twice already, hasn't it?
He saved me, Grandpa. He saved me.
To be saved, the Nation must have a new leader!
She saved my life and she is my master.
I made up my mind when I run away from the home.
I ran away from someone who hurt me
I remember him very well the day you saved me from him
Then someone came along, and she ran away and left me and I was lost.
When he came to, he saved me but not himself.
Magnum, maybe you think you saved Louise's life and I should be grateful, but you're wrong, because I really hold you responsible for everything that's happened.
